column5: His PB smallie.  A thrill for all of us.  Yes, he let him go.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LANKyk8ecEw&feature=plcp
Very Nice, Congrats on his PB Tight Lines SBK
Awesome Job Ben congrats on the new PB that is a great SM
Lookit that bend!!  Great to see.
Beautiful fish! Well done, Ben. As exciting as the landing of that fish was, the cheering and encouragement from the rest of the family is really special. Good on ya all.
Can't say it any better than Roy did. Good job!
Congrats to Ben  Good to see and hear everyone in the boat
Thanks for the replies folks.  Roy very kind words, much apprecicated.  Haven't been out much at all this year, crazy busy year.  Hopefully that changes going forward.
Jim we have open fall here be sure to drop a line will hook up for some wings I found a new place there awesome.
